title: FS: Polar Bears, Polar Bears, Polar Bears...

posts.post_title: FS: Polar Bears, Polar Bears, Polar Bears...
posts.post_content:
Focusing my collection again.  And moving off a stack of cards that don't fit the focus.  These Polar Bear backed cards didn't make the cut.

PM or e-mail.  [url]brian.coats@att.net[/url].  $3 shipping.  Prices are net to me.

All raw cards sold.  Ames PSA 3 remains
